statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPayments WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method FROM CustomerPayments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, payment_method, card_number FROM CustomerPayments WHERE payment_method = 'PayPal' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPayments WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01' AND cvv = 123;
SELECT customer_name, card_number FROM CustomerPayments WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPayments WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method FROM CustomerPayments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, card_number FROM CustomerPayments ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method, cvv FROM CustomerPayments WHERE payment_method = 'PayPal' AND cvv = 456;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPayments WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments;
SELECT first_name, last_name, card_number FROM customer_payments ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT first_name, last_name, card_number FROM customer_payments WHERE card_expiry_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, card_number, card_expiry_date FROM customer_payments WHERE security_code = '123' AND card_number LIKE '****1234%';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 1000 ORDER BY average_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method FROM customers WHERE payment_method='Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id=5;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method FROM customers WHERE payment_method='PayPal' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE payment_method='Credit Card';
SELECT customers.customer_name, transactions.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, payment_cards.card_type, payment_cards.card_number FROM customers JOIN payment_cards ON customers.customer_id = payment_cards.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(transactions.amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%card%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions t JOIN payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, COUNT(payment_id) AS payment_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT name, email FROM customer WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT phone_number, address FROM customer WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer.name, card_details.card_number FROM customer JOIN card_details ON customer.id = card_details.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer.name, payment.payment_amount FROM customer JOIN payment ON customer.id = payment.customer_id WHERE payment.payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, t.transaction_date AS transaction_date FROM customer c INNER JOIN transaction_history t ON c.id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 2000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, c.email AS customer_email, cd.card_number AS card_number FROM customer c LEFT JOIN card_details cd ON c.id = cd.customer_id WHERE cd.card_expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE;
